reports.title: name="Red Dead Redemption 2" appid="1174180" target_framerate="30-39 FPS title="Red Dead Redemption 2 performance overview and settings on Steam Deck."

data.summary: Red Dead Redemption 2 performance overview and settings on Steam Deck.
data.game_display_settings:
- **Resolution:** 1280x800
- **Screen Type:** Fullscreen
- **V-Sync:** Off
- **Triple Buffering:** On
- **Graphics API:** Vulcan
data.game_graphics_settings:
- **Texture Quality:** Ultra
- **Anisotropic Filtering:** x16
- **Lighting Quality:** High
- **Global Illumination Quality:** High
- **Shadow Quality:** Low
- **Far Shadow Quality:** Ultra
- **Screen Space Ambient Occlusion:** Ultra
- **Reflection Quality:** Low
- **Mirror Quality:** High
- **Water/Volumetric’s Quality:** Custom
- **Near Volumetric Resolution:** Low
- **Far Volumetric Resolution:** High
- **Volumetric Lighting Quality:** High
- **Particle Quality:** Ultra
- **Tesselation Quality:** Ultra
- **AMD FSR 2.0:** Off
- **TAA:** Medium
- **FXAA:** On
- **MSAA:** Off
- **Particle Lighting Quality:** Ultra
- **Soft Shadows:** Ultra
- **Grass Shadows:** Low
- **Long Shadows:** On
- **Full Resolution Screen Space Ambient Occlusion:** On
- **Water Refraction Quality:** Low
- **Water Reflection Quality:** Low
- **Water Physics Quality:** Furthest to the left
- **Resolution Scale:** Off
- **TAA Sharpening:** ~60%
- **Motion Blur:** Off
- **Reflection MSAA:** Off
- **Geometry Level of Detail:** One option away from full
- **Grass Level of Detail:** Furthest to the left
- **Tree Quality:** Ultra
- **Parallax Occlusion Mapping Quality:** Ultra
- **Decal Quality:** Ultra
- **Fur Quality:** High
- **Tree Tessellation:** Off
data.additional_notes:
The game runs at a locked 30 FPS with slight dips to 27-30 FPS in demanding areas (e.g., water or high NPC counts).
Settings deliver a visually impressive experience with manageable performance.

data.summary: Update 9/8/22: Due to the newest update adding in native FSR 2.0, we will be reassessing the buil...
data.game_display_settings:
- **Resolution:** 1280x800
- **Vsync and Triple Buffering:** Off
- **Texture Quality:** Medium
Everything else either low or off
- **Motion Blur:** Off
data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


With some compromises, and a 30 FPS cap, Red Dead Redemption 2 is an ace-in-the-hole!
- **Performance:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Stability:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Battery:** ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
